content: 4 if desired for one round edging begin abbreviations work pattern a edging once 2 rounds a b - color a or b for markers bobble - bind off body cm - centimeters s work the following stitch pattern repeating it across the co - cast on round k - knit work pattern b island hopping twice 40 rounds k2tog - knit 2 sts together work rounds 1 to 10 of pattern b island hopping once k2togtbl - knit 2 sts together through the back loop 10 rounds kwise - knitwise ma - beginning-of-round marker edging end mb - repeat marker work pattern a edging once 2 rounds mm - millimeter s remove markers in color b on the very last round of p - purl pattern a edging if necessary rm - remove marker in color as indicated sl - slip_stitch elastic bind-off sm - slip marker in color as indicated bind-off loosely as follows ssk - sl1 kwise sl1 kwise insert left needle into the front round 1 k1 *k1 slip 2 sts back to left needle k2togtbl of the 2 slipped stitches and knit them together through repeat from * to end of round rma the back loop st s - stitch es finishing yo - yarn over cut yarn and pull end through last stitch weave in and 4 lagunîs skeinwalker © 2025 skeinwalker about the designer schematic skeinwalker took on knitting during her end-of-year vacation in 2013 and decided to knit the garments she wanted to wear but could not find in the stores since h then she has knit dozens of sweaters cowls and shawls and she combines designing knitwear with her work at a software company as an ex-computer scientist ex- art kid and ex-freelance photographer she is drawn to structure architecture color and composition simplicity c and minimalism in construction for maximum effect are what she is looking for in her designs find her on circumference c 110 cm / 43 25 inches ravelry and instagram under the name skeinwalker feel height h 22 cm / 8 75 inches free to subscribe to the explorers weekly skeinwalker s newsletter for news sneak peeks and exclusive promotions skeinwalker lagunîs 5 © 2025 skeinwalker pattern a edging pattern b island hopping key 6 lagunîs skeinwalker © 2025 skeinwalker skeinwalker lagunîs 7 © 2025 skeinwalker 8 lagunîs skeinwalker © 2025 skeinwalker skeinwalker lagunîs 9 © 2025 skeinwalker tutorials this section lists the video tutorials that are relevant to the lagunîs cowl the tutorials demonstrate how to work stitches from basic to more advanced they also show how to work a specific part of the pattern if necessary and provide some tips for example for unknitting tinking if necessary yarn selection for lace projects https //youtu be/zxng9wx68t0 loose co for lace why we need it and how to estimate the length of the co tail https //youtu be/t9x1etnkxxw joining in the round working the first stitch and untwisting a twisted co https //youtu be/hxvhqjk2s2c chart 101
